definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: In high enough quantities it can cause serious kidney problems in people.
sentences.chinese: 足量的三聚氰胺可能導致人們出現嚴重腎臟問題。

sentences.english: I'd rather not eat any melamine at all.
sentences.chinese: 我本人寧願不喫任何含三聚氰胺的東西。

sentences.english: He suggested the contamination may have come from animal feeds.
sentences.chinese: 他表示三聚氰胺可能來自雞飼料。

sentences.english: Has melamine been found in other food products?
sentences.chinese: 是否在其它食品中也發現有三聚氰胺？

sentences.english: Also, most restaurant¬s use the hated melamine chopsticks for dine-in.
sentences.chinese: 同時，大部分餐館使用含有三聚氰胺的筷子就餐。

sentences.english: So how can melamine hurt you?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，三聚氰胺怎麼傷害你呢？

sentences.english: The amino resins used in paint industry are mainly the butanol etherified melamine resins.
sentences.chinese: 塗料用的氨基樹脂主要是丁醇醚化三聚氰胺樹脂。

sentences.english: Surface uses melamine and has flatness high, abrasion-resisting.
sentences.chinese: 表面採用三聚氰胺樹脂，平整度高，表面耐磨。

sentences.english: Experts say the most likely source of melamine in eggs is chicken feed.
sentences.chinese: 專家說，雞蛋中的三聚氰胺最有可能來自於雞飼料。

sentences.english: This paper approaches the effect of melamine on the cross-linking mechanism of polyphenylene sulfide resin.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在探討三聚氰胺對聚苯硫醚樹脂的交聯機理。

sentences.english: Melamine is a small polar triazine compound.
sentences.chinese: 三聚氰胺是一種三嗪類含氮雜環有機化合物。

sentences.english: Milk from Shanghai-based Bright Dairy also shows melamine contamination.
sentences.chinese: 上海光明乳業的牛奶產品中一樣含有三聚氰胺。

sentences.english: Board MDF coated with melamine surface colors.
sentences.chinese: 板面爲高密度板，外覆三聚氰胺面，顏色可選。

sentences.english: Melamine is now on a list of "inedible materials," the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 衛生部解釋稱，三聚氰胺已被列入非食用物質名單中。

sentences.english: Melamine phosphate is the key material to guarantee the comprehensive performances for insulting layer.
sentences.chinese: 三聚氰胺磷酸鹽是保障絕熱層綜合性能的關鍵材料。

sentences.english: How did the melamine wind up in the wheat gluten?
sentences.chinese: 三聚氰胺是如何摻入小麥麩子的呢？

definition: general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
